title: How to use hash functions for split test assignment
description: Hash-based user assignment brings experimenters many benefits in running split tests. It's used extensively in the industry (section 4.1.2, page 6), at companies like LinkedIn, Google, Microsoft and many others. Compared to the ephemeral random numbers generated from PRNGs, hash-based decisioning gives you far greater control:
